name: AskSenti Ltd.
description: Developer of a text and sentiment analytics engine designed to automate, support and survey feedback tagging. The company's engine tags support queries, understand trends and share them widely, enabling businesses to prioritize projects accordingly and retain more customers.
one_liner: Developer of a text and sentiment analytics engine designed to automate, support and survey feedback tagging. The company's engine tags support queries, understand trends and share them widely, enabling businesses to prioritize projects accordingly and retain more customers.
